hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the :Messenger of Allah (saas) said: "No one among you should say: "O Allah, forgive me if You will.' Let him be definite in his asking, and no one can compel Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي إِنْ شِئْتَ
chapter.eng-name: A Man Should Not Say: "O Allah, Forgive Me If You Will".
